The EP numbering for season 1 is going to be all screwed up.

S01E01 is the same as S01E00 that was out last year.  Only a few scenes with titties were cut for tv broadcast. So if you have E00, you don't need this one.

Some sites are already calling the pilot E01/02 because it is two hours long, which could make the first new episode of 2010 E03-Rebirth.  The lame E01/02 shit has already been done before with Warehouse 13. Hopefully it won't happen here.

Anyway, because of SciFi re-airing the pilot from last April and calling it E01, we now have thousands of people downloading the same shit they leeched and watched last year.

Yeah, but I didn't see a 720p copy of it last time.
;)
Thanks EZTV! You rock!
